TopicTitle: [Question for moderator] Where is most appropriate place to announce YouTube series for newcomers?

Articles.Content:
Hello,

Looking for guidance to announce (read "plug") my YouTube series targeting users who are looking to begin adding some of these wonderful mods to their game. At this point I don't want to link to it anywhere (even in this post) because I consider it to be in poor taste to peddle my channel in inappropriate places. I thought either this sub-forum or maybe the General Welcome Aboard sub-forum but I wasn't sure...

I'm 12 episodes in (about 1 / week) and have had some wonderful modders such as Athonic (Chatterer), Nightingale (Waypoint Manager), and even PorkJet (Habitat Pack) feature my videos on their mod thread OPs. I would love to encourage more people to dive into the mods pool but I can't if they aren't aware of my series

Any guidance would be appreciated. Thanks!

max

In the forums ? The Live from Mission Control section.

Do you create KSP videos or run KSP streams? Post them here!
Yes, the Live from Mission Control! subforums is the most appropriate place for YouTube videos.
You can put a link in your signature, it's not in poor taste to advertise your creations of your signature. Go to Settings (On the top of the page) and hit Edit Signature, on the left-hand sidebar.
